titles.title: To extend the deadlines under part I of the Federal Power Act for commencement of construction of two hydroelectric projects in the State of New York.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 2/13/2002--Introduced. Instructs the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon licensee request, to extend the time period to commence the construction of projects numbered 4244 and 10648, for three consecutive two-year periods.Provides for reinstatement of expired licenses.
